CustomField.formula: CASE( MONTH(TODAY()),1, Jan_Original_Budget__c , 2, Feb_Original_Budget__c,3, Mar_Original_Budget__c,4, Apr_Original_Budget__c,5, May_Original_Budget__c, 6, Jun_Original_Budget__c, 7, Jul_Original_Budget__c, 8, Aug_Original_Budget__c, 9,Sep_Original_Budget__c, 10, Oct_Original_Budget__c, 11, Nov_Original_Budget__c, 12, Dec_Original_Budget__c,0 )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Expected Target for current month. This is the total Target expected for the current month, not a MTD figure.
CustomField.label: Current Month Planned Revenue
